## Description {#details}

Help to insert <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sdnodeflags">SDNodeFlags</a> automatically in transforming.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> RAII to save and resume flags in current scope.

Definition at line 371 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondag-h">SelectionDAG.h</a>.
